Description:
FEELS LIKE HOME!
Superbly located opposite natural bush land and with elevated views towards Mount Alexander this home is a rare find. Full of character and charm the home features polished timber boards, cathedral ceilings and large feature windows that allow an abundance of natural light to filter through the home. The split level design creates a cosy lounge with wood fire and sliding doors that lead to the generous rear entertainers deck. Built for those who love to entertain the rear deck overlooks the generous rear yard while offering panoramic views to the south.
The current vendors have transformed this property both inside and out to create a warm and inviting home that captures the best of its surrounds. Whether you're entertaining friends on the rear deck or enjoying a quiet night in beside the wood fire you can enjoy the picturesque outlook that's on offer.
In all the property features 3 bedrooms including spacious master with ensuire and WIR, fully appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, undercover parking for 3 vehicles and a 920m2 allotment.
Other features include:
- 5kw Solar System
- 2 x split system heating/cooling units
- Wood fire in lounge
Insights: 2 Lowe Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Address: 252 MacKenzie Street West Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Lifestyle Living in Kangaroo Flat.
A beautifully refurbished home highlighting both modern styling, plenty of character and side access.
Nestled in central MacKenzie Street West sits this sturdy and well-maintained property offering all the benefits of its location; close to Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre, walking tracks, schools and daycares or a short drive to Kangaroo Flat's shopping precinct or Bendigo CBD.
Stepping inside you'll be impressed by the unique character styling throughout; feature brick walls, polished timber flooring, a cosy wood heater, stunning timber ceilings and decorative light fittings.
Your kitchen offers plenty of natural light, bench and preparation space, overhead storage and quality appliances.
Unique to this property is its large 4m by 6.5m multipurpose room, ideal for a teenagers retreat or second living space.
Your two bathrooms are a standout with completely new fitouts; modern tiling, vanity, bath and large showers complimented with high end finishes.
Outside the home continues to shine with its retaining wall, greenery, undercover entertaining patio and 6m by 7.5m concreted and powered shed.
Within minutes to Kangaroo Flat's shopping strip or Bendigo CBD, the location provides true ease of living.
Invest and bring in a rental income or move right in and call it home, contact
agent Jesse Forbes for a private inspection.
Insights: 252 MacKenzie Street West, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
A Picture Perfect Home
Indulge in this beautiful Russell Parsons built home. This 3 bedroom (with the potential of a 4th) modern masterpiece is set out on a generous 715m2 block in the heart of Kangaroo Flat with Lansell Square minutes away.
Every element of this build is infused with unique finishes, high end materials and a clever well flowing open floorplan.
Complete with a cinema room at the front of the house, with the projector and speakers to stay. The study (4th bedroom) includes lovely views of the water feature that is also included in the sale. The main bedroom consists of a WIR and an ensuite with a walk-in shower.
The kitchen spills out to a covered alfresco entertaining area with lovely decking, and a bonus addition of vergola shutters to extend the area. It has been cleverly designed and deliberately placed in the middle of the home. This is accompanied with a perfect view of the backyard and allowing natural light to come in from every angle.
The main living area includes a gas log fire for extra added comfort. Heading down the hall to bedrooms 3 and 4 an attractive main bathroom again with a lovely tiled walk-in shower and of course a spacious laundry with access to outside.
Also complete with ducted heating and cooling throughout will have this beauty at a perfect temperature all year round. Not to mention the ceiling fans to get the air flowing through nicely.
Front and back gardens are easy to maintain, and well established meaning this one is ready for you to move straight in with no work needed.
* Spacious Russell Parsons built home
* 3 bedroom home + large study
* Cinema room - set up ready to use
* Updated stylish kitchen
* Lovely decked alfresco, vergola shutters
* Workshop with power & concrete
* Beautifully landscaped - no work needed
* Great location - close to Lansell Square
* 3KW solar panels
* Lovely water feature to stay
* Ceiling fans throughout
* Block size approx. 715m2
Insights: 4 Medika Avenue, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
the Perfect Suburban Home
This light-filled meticulously presented home is set to impress.
From the immaculately presented front garden and facade right through to the neat as pin backyard boasting an abundance of storage options, this three-bedroom home set on a generous 764m2 in its quiet street location is ready for you to move straight in.
Inside, feel right at home with the cosy set up; your inviting open plan kitchen meals and lounge - which flows directly to your undercover and enclosed entertaining patio - allows for ease of living for the whole family.
The naturally lit kitchen offers all the essentials; stainless steel appliances, overhead storage and a built-in pantry. The bedrooms are designed for comfort and practicality, each one boasting carpets and ceiling fans, with a walk-in robe to the main and its own access to the main bathroom, and built-in robes in the other bedrooms.
The ducted heating, two-split systems, ceiling fans throughout and handy front shade awnings makes controlling the climate a breeze all year round.
The highlight of the home is the outdoors; easily entertain your guests under your quality entertaining patio with timber decking, cafe style blinds and the set-up for an outdoor TV.
Adding to the exterior features is the designated fire pit, landscaped gardens, two water tanks and the ample storage options including a 6m x 7m concrete and powered shed, two garden sheds and a double carport.
Wrapping up the appeal is the home's idyllic location; close to Kangaroo Flat Primary School, Train Station, Crusoe College and Lansell Square, this investment opportunity won't last long.
Insights: 13 Gledhill Rise, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
COMFORTABLE HOME ON LARGE 2,220m2 BLOCK
With easy access to the Calder Highway and just minutes to Kangaroo Flat shops, this property will appeal to those with a vision. The comfortable brick home features three bedrooms two of which have BIR's, lounge and kitchen/dining area. Outside you will find a low maintenance yard and single garage. Set on a large bock of 2,220m2 this property has sub-division potential (STCA). It's location is popular due to its proximity to child-care, primary and secondary schools, shopping and transport, this property is will appeal to a wide variety of purchasers.
Note: ALL ENQUIRY MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER

Description:
NEAT & TIDY FAMILY HOME ON WIDE BLOCK
Located at the top of a quiet court, this brick veneer family home is within easy reach of bus stops, primary and secondary schools, childcare, and the many amenities of Kangaroo Flat. Recently updated throughout, the property is neat as a pin both inside and out.
The front door opens into a spacious lounge room with an exposed brick feature wall and ample natural light. The room, essentially an L-shape, leads around to an area that could easily serve as a study or formal dining space. The large open plan kitchen diner can be accessed via this room, and also from the main entry. Recently updated, the contemporary kitchen enjoys plenty of storage, including a coffee station, and a timeless, neutral finish.
A hallway off the entry leads down to the four bedrooms, all with built-in robes, along with a large laundry; a separate toilet, and a family bathroom. The master bedroom features additional storage and a three-piece ensuite.
A glass sliding door from the dining space opens out to the back garden. A verandah, and undercover alfresco area provides room for outdoor entertaining, and the easy-care yard is mainly set to lawn. The double carport at the front of the house opens at the rear to a generously-proportioned work shed, and double gates offer vehicle access to the backyard and a double bay shed with twin roller doors.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling
Gas wall heater
Kitchen appliances including wall oven, four-burner gas cooktop and dishwasher
Updated throughout with contemporary flooring, paint, kitchen and bathroom
Work shed with toilet, basin, concrete flooring, power and lights
Double bay shed with power, lights and flooring
Water tank x 2 (1 x 5000l and 1 x 1000l)
Excellent off-street parking
With close proximity to all amenities, yet tucked away in a quiet area, this property is ideal for a buyer seeking a low-maintenance, surprisingly spacious property with excellent shed, storage and workshop options.
Insights: 2 Rose Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Build you dream home
Rarely do you get this opportunity to purchase a vacant block of land in such a magnificent well established area of Kangaroo Flat.
Two to choose from, both generous sized allotments, fully fenced and representing great value. Fully titled and ready to build on. Located within walking distance to major shopping centers, crusoe reservoir, schools and medical centers so you need to act fast.

Description:
Downsize in comfort
This immaculately presented home located within the Karinya Gardens retirement village of Aviva Communities, will certainly catch the attention of those wanting convenience with a fuss-free lifestyle.
Offering 2 bedrooms both with built in robes and a separate study or potential third bedroom. The open plan kitchen/dining and living areas are light filled, and overlook the front of the home. The kitchen is well equipped with a gas cooktop/electric oven, pantry and plenty of storage.
Other features include a great sized lounge, quality block-out blinds and window furnishings, plus tinted front windows.
Gas heating and split system heating/cooling.
Outside has a low maintenance garden with garden shed and 2-car tandem carport.
Downsize in comfort in this well-established, friendly community close to buses and only minutes from Lansell Square shopping precinct.

Description:
Convenient Modern Style Minutes From Amenities.
If you are looking for sound investment property or a fantastic modern first home, this is it.
Neat, tidy and modern, with low maintenance back yard. This 3 bedroom family-friendly home offers 2 living zones, 2 bathrooms and ample storage. Master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe, second and third bedrooms with built-in robes. Main bathroom with tub and separate toilet.
The home features ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
Nestled in a quiet side street, yet offering quick and easy access to the Calder Highway, and situated on the right side of town for a quick commute to Melbourne.
Close to Lansell Plaza, Harvey Norman, Bunnings and the Homemaker Centre. Also just 10 minutes from the Bendigo CBD
Kangaroo Flat is proven to be a strong performing suburb over the last 5 years with median property prices rising by $64,000.
Get your foot in the door here and you won't look back!

Description:
POSITION PERFECT, RIPE FOR DEVELOPMENT
Situated in an ultra-convenient position at the end of a quiet court is this affordable weatherboard home occupying a large 1131m2 allotment that is ripe for development! A stones throw from all the local Kangaroo Flat amenities, you can leave the car at home and walk to Lansell Square Shopping Centre, Rocklea Homemaker Centre, Bunnings, Aldi Supermarket, schools and the Kangaroo Flat Train Station.
The large allotment opens out from a its sizeable street frontage to a flat, cleared and easily accessible block that has huge potential for further development STCA. Keep the existing home, or remove it and work with a totally blank canvas the choice is yours based on the best financial gain. Draft concept plans are available on request for you to visualise what is achievable, which include options for 2, 3 or 4 lot subdivisions with a mix of 2, 3 and 4 bedroom townhouses. Or, you may just want a large allotment in a fantastic location to build your dream home on?
The existing home is in need of renovation, but is comfortable enough to rent out whilst you decide what to do with the property. Featuring three carpeted bedrooms, central bathroom with shower over bath, generous living area with split system heating and cooling, timber kitchen with separate meals area, and laundry with separate toilet at the rear. There is an existing lock up garage and shed which are separate from the house, a covered outdoor area, and loads of rooms out the back for kids or pets.
So much potential with options aplenty, this affordable property will be worth your time and money in the long run. Be quick, as at this price it will not last long!

Description:
Neat as a pin
You will be hard pressed trying to find a neater home that 10 Cobb Court, Kangaroo Flat. Within easy walking distance to Crusoe Reservoir, Harvey Norman and Lansell Square Shopping Precinct. This gem boasts modern living and a functional design at an affordable price. Features 3 spacious bedrooms, Master with walk through robes into the ensuite. The remaining rooms are a great size with built in robes. A generous living area, fully appointed kitchen, large windows for natural light, double garage with internal access. Outside is a fantastic entertainers deck area and a huge side yard, perfect side access for the caravan. Make the most of nearby picturesque walking tracks which connect Kangaroo Flat to Crusoe Reservoir. Well positioned for those who commute to Melbourne. Would make a great first home, investment or the ultimate retirement home.
Inspections will not disappoint.

Description:
SPACE AND PRIVACY
This unique home offers plenty of room to entertain. A large kitchen / meals area, dining room and formal lounge run across the front of the home looking onto a huge front veranda with lovely elevated views. Two of the three bedrooms are unusually large and have their own walk in robes. There is a gas heater, open fire place and a number of split systems throughout the home. An oversized double garage, study / 4th bedroom and external toilet complete the picture. Set on a fully established block in excess of 1,200m2 at the end of a quiet court yet so close to so many amenities - bus at Mackenzie Street West, Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre, Kangaroo Flat shops and train station. This home and block is of proportions not often seen.
Contact us today for a private inspection.

Description:
** OPEN FOR INSPECTION CANCELLED 13/6/2020 ** THE APPEAL OF THE COUNTRY WITH THE CONVENIENCE OF THE CITY!
Flexibility in a home for larger than average families is hard to find in todays market. In fact, it can be somewhat of a rarity! That's why this fabulous western red cedar, located in a quiet pocket of Kangaroo Flat, should delight those who have been frustrated by their lack of options!
Set on over three quarters of an acre (approx. 3247m2), the property offers the peace and quiet of the country, whilst enjoying the convenience of the city at your doorstep. All local amenities are close by, including schools, train station, Lansell Square shopping centre, and the main Kangaroo Flat shopping strip.
The north facing home was originally built in the early 1990's and has stood the test of time well. In terrific order throughout, it has been recently extended to offer extra versatility to a growing family. Boasting a generous five bedrooms, the floor plan can also be configured as four bedrooms with an extra living space if you don't need a fifth. All bedrooms have built in robes, the master has a split system unit, walk-in robe and ensuite. The main bathroom has been updated and includes large frameless shower, his and hers vanity and separate toilet. Adjacent is a large laundry, whilst ducted heating and cooling flow throughout. The main hub of the home encompasses the spacious living area, adjoining dining space, whilst the country style kitchen has quality timber cabinetry, loads of storage, breakfast bar, dishwasher, and electric cooking facilities.
Outside, the enormity of the block allows for kids and pets to thrive! Front and rear verandas are the perfect vantage points to enjoy the serenity, with the position of the sun determining the perfect spot depending on the time of year! There is driveway access to the rear where a 6m x 12m (approx) shed will impress the home handyman or tinkerer! Complete with concrete floor, 15 amp power available, and a man cave currently set up in the back half, shed enthusiasts are well and truly catered for here! Other features include further sundry shedding, established trees, seasonal water feature that attracts the local birds and wildlife, and plenty of further scope to add your own ideas to this massive space!
A large family home on a huge block with everything you need on your doorstep. Not to mention the possibility of further development down the track (STCA) an extra financial incentive for when the kids move out! Properties such as this are rare in todays market, so call now to find out more
Insights: 12 Muir Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 5 other 5 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
HOME IS WHERE YOUR STORY BEGINS
Just one look is all you will need for this neat, sweet and complete home in Kangaroo Flat.
It's impeccably presented - just move in and enjoy the two good-sized bedrooms, main with walk-in-robe/dressing room, a spacious lounge and bright kitchen with gas cooking and ample cabinetry including island bench. Extra living spaces include the fully enclosed front porch creating the ideal sunroom where you can sit and soak up the morning sun filtering through Venetian blinds plus a dining/sitting room opening to a rear paved outdoor entertaining area underneath a wisteria-draped pergola.
The bathroom and internal WC are located off the main hallway while all floor and window coverings are in top condition while gas heating and split system air conditioning ensure year-round comfort.
The fully-fenced large block (approx 1040m²) includes a 6m x 3m workshop, sundry shedding and gated single carport with plenty of room for further shedding etc. if desired.
This cheerful and bright home would be a great investment property or first home - a short stroll will have you in the Kangaroo Flat shopping centre for a coffee or walk the children to the nearby schools, bus stop or playground.
Well maintained, affordable brick homes are hard to find, so if you're in the market for your first, last or investment property, you should check this one out.
Insights: 13 Olympic Parade, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 20 other 2 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.
